4.eng-name: The Book on the Day of Friday
4.ara-name: كِتَاب الْجُمُعَةِ عَنْ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ

hadiths.text: Sahl bin Ma'adh bin Anas al Jahni narrated from his father that :Allah's Messenger said: "Whoever steps over the necks of the people on Friday, he has taken a bridge to Hell

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ التَّخَطِّي يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related] About It Being Disliked To Step Over (The Necks Of Others) On Friday
